page.title: 04TECHNOLOGY ON FARMS
page.content: The farmers in our area do not use the most modern machines,because the farms are small and the equipment is expensive.Most farm work is done by tractors.Special attachments drop {fertiliser}onto the soil near the seeds.A mechanical lime spreader has spinning discs which spread lime over the soil to make it fertile.{Weeds}are a nuisance to the farmer.They grow quickly and stop his crop from growing.To get rid of them he uses a sprayer filled with{weedkilling liquid.The sprayer is usually a plastic tank attached to a long pipe with holes in.Another useful weedkilling device is the flame gun.It is carried along and it burns out weeds with a scorching flame.Modern dairy farmers at{Sortridge Farm}use mechanical devices to milk cows hygenically and efficiently.
